comments.text: Can you make a video of how to reinstall Windows 10?

replies.text:
You just use the media creation tool or go to settings and type ‚ÄúReset this PC‚Äù and select remove everything, alternatively, you can use a USB drive and use the media creation tool to make it bootable, (from another PC) then you can reinstall windows from the USB. Just ensure you select the right version upon reinstalling otherwise it won‚Äôt be activated.
(If you have home, select home, if you have pro, select pro etc.)
